meta-description: Because of the pressure of rising customer expectations, companies are using personalized customer experiences to gain an advantage. This overview of Liferay Digital Experience Platform assesses the business benefits of DXP's features and how it helps create connected customer experiences finely tuned to your customer's needs in any context.
